original: mnan ba rjes su 'brangs pa yis //
analyzed: mnan ba rjes su 'brangs pa yis //
translated: The one called the follower is for the repressing activity.

original: bsad pa'i las ni rgya mtshor 'dod //
analyzed: bsad pa'i las ni rgya mtshor 'dod //
translated: The activity of killing is desired in the ocean.

original: las rnams de dag re re yang //
analyzed: las rnams de dag re re yang //
translated: Each of these activities

original: 'phags tshogs mchod sbyin dang po ste //
analyzed: 'phags tshogs mchod sbyin dang po ste //
translated: is the first, the offering to the assembly of nobles;

original: nyi ma gnyis par gtor ma sbyin //
analyzed: nyi ma gnyis par gtor ma sbyin //
translated: on the second day, the sacrificial cake is given;

original: gsum pa bzlas pa rnam par 'bad //
analyzed: gsum pa bzlas pa rnam par 'bad //
translated: on the third, one exerts oneself in the recitation;

original: bzhi pa sbyin sreg tshang bar bya //
analyzed: bzhi pa sbyin sreg tshang bar bya //
translated: on the fourth, the burnt offering is completed;

original: lnga pa las kyi 'khor lo bskor //
analyzed: lnga pa las kyi 'khor lo bskor //
translated: on the fifth, the wheel of activity is turned;

original: drug pa bsam gtan rtse gcig bya //
analyzed: drug pa bsam gtan rtse gcig bya //
translated: on the sixth, one should be one-pointed in concentration;

original: bdun pa las kyi lhag chad bskrad //
analyzed: bdun pa las kyi lhag chad bskrad //
translated: on the seventh, one should expel the excess and deficiency of the activity.

original: grogs kyi las la khyad par du //
analyzed: grogs kyi las la khyad par du //
translated: In particular, with regard to the activity of the friend,

original: las kyi gtsor ni gang sgrub de'i //
analyzed: las kyi gtsor ni gang sgrub de'i //
translated: whatever is the principal activity to be accomplished,

original: 'khor lo bskor ba nyi ma bzhi //
analyzed: 'khor lo bskor ba nyi ma bzhi //
translated: the wheel is turned for four days.

original: las kyi bye brag 'di shes na //
analyzed: las kyi bye brag 'di shes na //
translated: Having understood this distinction of activities,

original: zhi bas 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob //
analyzed: zhi bas 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob //
translated: through pacification, one is protected from the eight fears;

original: rgyas pas yon tan drug dang 'byor //
analyzed: rgyas pas yon tan drug dang 'byor //
translated: through enrichment, one is endowed with the six qualities;

original: dbang gis mos pa rnam bzhir bsgyur //
analyzed: dbang gis mos pa rnam bzhir bsgyur //
translated: through power, one transforms the four kinds of devotion;

original: dbye bas gsang sde brgyad dang 'byed //
analyzed: dbye bas gsang sde brgyad dang 'byed //
translated: through separation, one separates the eight secret clans;

original: mnan pas dbang po drug 'ching byed //
analyzed: mnan pas dbang po drug 'ching byed //
translated: through suppression, one binds the six sense faculties.

original: gzhan yang ji lta de bzhin du //
analyzed: gzhan yang ji lta de bzhin du //
translated: Moreover, just like that,

original: sngags dang rdzas kyi sbyor ba la //
analyzed: sngags dang rdzas kyi sbyor ba la //
translated: in the combination of mantras and substances,

original: dpyad na dngos grub mi 'grub ste //üîΩgal te yid gnyis za gyur tam //
analyzed: dpyad na dngos grub mi 'grub ste // gal te yid gnyis za gyur tam //
translated: If analyzed, accomplishments will not be attained.üîΩIf one has doubts,

original: bsam pa 'gyur ram dad pa nyams //
analyzed: bsam pa 'gyur ram dad pa nyams //
translated: Or if one‚Äôs thoughts change or one‚Äôs faith deteriorates,

original: de tshe dngos grub nye ba yang //
analyzed: de tshe dngos grub nye ba yang //
translated: Then even if accomplishment is near,

original: phyir ldog 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
analyzed: phyir ldog 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
translated: There is no doubt that it will be turned away.

original: dad pa brtan pos bsgrubs pa na //
analyzed: dad pa brtan pos bsgrubs pa na //
translated: If one practices with stable faith,

original: nam mkha' med par gyur na yang //
analyzed: nam mkha' med par gyur na yang //
translated: Even if space were to disappear,

original: sngags kyi dngos grub med mi srid //üîΩlha dang drang srong gis bshad pa'i //
analyzed: sngags kyi dngos grub med mi srid // lha dang drang srong gis bshad pa'i //
translated: It is impossible for the accomplishments of mantra to be absent.üîΩIt is impossible for the knowledge mantras

original: rig sngags bslu ba mi srid na //üîΩ'dod chags bral bas bshad pa yi //
analyzed: rig sngags bslu ba mi srid na // 'dod chags bral bas bshad pa yi //
translated: Taught by gods and sages to be false.üîΩThe union of secret mantra taught by those free of desire

original: gsang sngags sbyor bas bslu ba ni //
analyzed: gsang sngags sbyor bas bslu ba ni //
translated: Is not something that can be deceived.

original: @421b ma byung 'gyur bar mi 'gyur ro //üîΩchos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
analyzed: @421b ma byung 'gyur bar mi 'gyur ro // chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
translated: It is not something that has not occurred and will not occur.üîΩThose who have no doubt

original: don la the tshom med pa yis //
analyzed: don la the tshom med pa yis //
translated: About the inconceivable meaning of reality

original: mkhas pa la ni dngos grub nye //üîΩyang na blun po dad pa brtan //
analyzed: mkhas pa la ni dngos grub nye // yang na blun po dad pa brtan //
translated: Will have accomplishments near to the wise.üîΩAlternatively, the accomplishments of union

original: de la sbyor ba'i dngos grub nye //
analyzed: de la sbyor ba'i dngos grub nye //
translated: Will be near to the faithful fools.üîΩThe accomplishments of practice

original: rtog cing dpyod pa'i rtog ge ba //üîΩde la sgrub pa'i dngos grub ring //
analyzed: rtog cing dpyod pa'i rtog ge ba //üîΩde la sgrub pa'i dngos grub ring //
translated: Will be far from those who are logicians who think and analyze.

original: bla mas man ngag bstan byas kyang //
analyzed: bla mas man ngag bstan byas kyang //
translated: Even if the guru teaches the intimate instructions,

original: slob ma yid gnyis za gyur na //
analyzed: slob ma yid gnyis za gyur na //
translated: if the disciple has doubts,

original: de la dngos grub ring bar bshad //
analyzed: de la dngos grub ring bar bshad //
translated: it is said that accomplishment is far away.

original: bla mas man ngag spas byas kyang //
analyzed: bla mas man ngag spas byas kyang //
translated: Even if the guru teaches the intimate instructions,

original: slob ma yid gnyis mi za zhing //
analyzed: slob ma yid gnyis mi za zhing //
translated: if the disciple does not have doubts

original: bla ma'i man ngag dam pa zhes //
analyzed: bla ma'i man ngag dam pa zhes //
translated: and cherishes the guru‚Äôs sublime intimate instructions,

original: gces spras byas na 'grub par nges //
analyzed: gces spras byas na 'grub par nges //
translated: it is certain that they will be accomplished.

original: de yi phyir na sngags pa yis //
analyzed: de yi phyir na sngags pa yis //
translated: Therefore, the mantra practitionerüîΩshould please the guru

original: rang gi yid gnyis spang ba'i phyir //üîΩbla ma mnyes par bya ba gces //
analyzed: rang gi yid gnyis spang ba'i phyir // bla ma mnyes par bya ba gces //
translated: in order to abandon their own doubts.

original: bsnyen bkur byas na nus mthu che //
analyzed: bsnyen bkur byas na nus mthu che //
translated: If they are served, there is great power.

original: gsang ste brjod pas bar chad med //
analyzed: gsang ste brjod pas bar chad med //
translated: If they are kept secret, there are no obstacles.

original: yon tan phul ba byas pas ni //
analyzed: yon tan phul ba byas pas ni //
translated: If they are offered,

original: rang sems rin chen rnam gnyis 'gyur //
analyzed: rang sems rin chen rnam gnyis 'gyur //
translated: one‚Äôs own precious mind will be transformed into the two precious jewels.

original: rin chen gnyis las grub par 'byung //
analyzed: rin chen gnyis las grub par 'byung //
translated: Accomplishment arises from the two precious jewels.

original: dkon par gyur pas sngags pa brjod //
analyzed: dkon par gyur pas sngags pa brjod //
translated: Since they are rare, the mantra practitioner is praised.

original: bsngags na yon tan 'byung 'gyur te //
analyzed: bsngags na yon tan 'byung 'gyur te //
translated: If they are praised, qualities will arise.

original: bsngags pa dag ni ma byas na //
analyzed: bsngags pa dag ni ma byas na //
translated: If praise is not offered,

original: ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu yang //
analyzed: ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu yang //
translated: even though the precious jewel is held in one‚Äôs hand,

original: gang gis bsngags pa ma byas pa //
analyzed: gang gis bsngags pa ma byas pa //
translated: it will not grant any wishes.

original: de la 'dod don mi ster ro //
analyzed: de la 'dod don mi ster ro //
translated: He will not grant the desired aim.

original: dad pa sangs rgyas dad pa chos //üîΩdad pa dge 'dun dad pa ma //
analyzed: dad pa sangs rgyas dad pa chos // dad pa dge 'dun dad pa ma //
translated: Faith is the Buddha, faith is the Dharma,üîΩFaith is the Sa·πÖgha, faith is the mother,

original: dad pa bla ma dad pa pha //
analyzed: dad pa bla ma dad pa pha //
translated: Faith is the guru, faith is the father,

original: dad pa lam chen dad pa dru //
analyzed: dad pa lam chen dad pa dru //
translated: Faith is the great path, faith is the six,

original: dad pa yid bzhin nor bu ste //
analyzed: dad pa yid bzhin nor bu ste //
translated: Faith is the wish-fulfilling jewel,

original: dad pa gsang sngags dngos grub nyid //
analyzed: dad pa gsang sngags dngos grub nyid //
translated: Faith is the accomplishment of the secret mantra,

original: dad pa bsod nams nor yin te //
analyzed: dad pa bsod nams nor yin te //
translated: Faith is the wealth of merit,

original: de yi phyir na sngags pa yis //
analyzed: de yi phyir na sngags pa yis //
translated: Therefore, the mantra practitioner

original: rang @422a *// sems dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rang @422a *// sems dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to generate faith in one's own mind,

original: gzhan la gus ba mchog tu bkur //
analyzed: gzhan la gus ba mchog tu bkur //
translated: Should greatly respect others.

original: dbal gshin rje gshed nag bo'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i cho ga las /üîΩlas kyi rgyud dang grogs bsten pa'i rtog pa ste gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: dbal gshin rje gshed nag bo'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i cho ga las / las kyi rgyud dang grogs bsten pa'i rtog pa ste gsum pa'o ////
translated: From the ritual of turning the wheel of glorious black YamƒÅri,üîΩThe third chapter on relying on the tantra and companions is complete.

analyzed: gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud rtog pa gsum pa rdzogs so //
